briefdescription.para: ProfileComponent displays a user's profile with their posts.

detaileddescription.para:
Features:
Profile header (avatar, display name, username, bio)
Follower/following counts (tappable)
User's posts in a scrollable list
Follow/unfollow button (for other users)
Edit profile button (for own profile)
Social links display
Genre tags
Member since date
Profile sharing
